title: Killing Gods - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Xuanhuan
tags: Alchemy   Clever Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Fast Learner   Gate to Another World   Male Protagonist   Military   Multiple Realms   Nobles   Polygamy   Revenge   Romantic Subplot   Royalty   Shameless Protagonist   Thieves   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Yiji Juechen   一骑绝尘
description: Li Changfeng, a talent of Yulong Empire in Ruize Land, loses all cultivation bases in a sacrifice ceremony for a holy beast – White Tiger, even his meridians fades away; then he becomes a cultivation idiot. A military commander from Huaxia country in Earth replaces original Li Changfeng by accident, and awakens the White Tiger that hides in his body. From then on, a formidable cultivation road for the strong is waiting for him.>
